source.description: Select the news category to collect from. This filter is applied to the traditional RSS Feeds AND is used to determine the topic filter for the Alpha Vantage NEWS_SENTIMENT API.

customFeedUrl.title: Custom RSS Feed URL
customFeedUrl.description: Provide a custom RSS feed URL (if 'Custom' selected). This applies only to the standard RSS data source.

maxArticles.title: Maximum Articles Per Source
maxArticles.description: The maximum number of articles to fetch from *each* source (RSS and Alpha Vantage). The final output dataset may contain up to double this number.

useSummarization.title: Use AI Summarization (Extra Cost üí∏)
useSummarization.description: If true, the Gemini model will generate a concise, market-focused summary for *every* article, which incurs an additional cost (Pay Point 2: LLM Summarization). [**RECOMMENDED OPTION**; otherwise output will only be basic RSS summary]

runTestMode.title: Admin Test Mode (Bypasses ALL External API Costs)
runTestMode.description: Setting this to true bypasses the Alpha Vantage API call and all Gemini (Grounding + Summarization) LLM calls, enabling zero-cost testing of the workflow. **DO NOT ENABLE IN PRODUCTION.**
